text: Nguoi (hoi Thien Su) hay noi (voi nhung ke đa than nay): “Neu cac nguoi noi that (rang cac than linh cua cac nguoi co the mang lai đieu loi va đay lui đieu du) thi cac nguoi hay cho ta biet neu hinh phat cua Allah tum lay cac nguoi hoac Gio Tan The (bat ngo) xay đen, co phai cac nguoi se cau xin ai khac ngoai Allah chu?!”
